comment.author: 87355012@N06
comment._content: The Post Office was located on Thames and High Street. It became a Handicraft Centre run by my mother (Mrs. Molly James) for several years. Me and my siblings spent many happy days there after school in the 70's. It also housed the Tourism Department. This lot is now a vendor's mall east of the new Post Office.

comment.author: 87335114@N03
comment._content: Top photo looks like St. John's POlice Station located at corner of Market & Newgate Street.
